content: lucky penny poncho - child sizes the perfect cold weather friend the squishy yarn dense fabric and cushiony cowl make this a go-to design for winter you can get the ladies sizes here 1 > this pattern is also available for free on my blog 2 > purchase any 4 or more regular price patterns in my ravelry shop and get 25% off no coupon code needed all of my patterns have been tested by several accomplished pattern testers and designers to ensure that you are getting a pattern free of mistakes and is easy to follow please note that all my patterns are written in standard american terms sign up for my weekly newsletter so you don t miss a thing http //eepurl com/dybjgn please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions you are free to sell what you make from this pattern but you may not share copy or reproduce this pattern in part or whole photographs are also copyright protected and may never be used please link back to one of my shops if selling your finished items online ©pamela dajczak 2019 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lucky-penny-poncho-ladies 2 http //www sincerelypam com/lucky-penny-poncho-free-crochet-pattern/
